vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.11;
son of: Levi (H3878);
brother of: Gershon (H1648), Merari (H4847) and Jochebed (H3115);
father of: Amram (H6019), Izhar (H3324), Hebron (H2275B) and Uzziel (H5816)
Group of qe.hat (קְהָת "Kohath" H6955)
§ Kohathites = see Kohath "assembly"
the descendants of Kohath, the 2nd son of Levi
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Quehat; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哥轄人 这个形容詞 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 參看哥轄 "集會" (6955)
利未的第二個兒子哥轄的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哥辖人 这个形容词 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 参看哥辖 "集会" (6955)
利未的第二个儿子哥辖的后裔
